channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: US Bans Kaspersky Software
item.description: Using a Trump-era authority, the US Commerce Department has banned the sale of Kaspersky’s antivirus tools to new customers in the US, citing alleged ...

item.title: Google is making your movie and TV reviews visible under a new profile page
item.description: Google is making all your movie, TV shows, books, albums and game reviews visible under one profile page starting June 24, according to an email sent ...

item.title: Bugatti’s Tourbillon 2024: Price, Specs, Availability
item.description: Furiously complicated and astoundingly fast, the 250-mph, 1,800-hp, electrically enhanced, blood-curdling Tourbillon signals the start of Rimac’s infl...

item.title: Zepto, a 10-minute delivery app, raises $665M at $3.6B valuation
item.description: Zepto, an Indian quick commerce startup, has more than doubled its valuation to $3.6 billion in a new funding round of $665 million. © 2024 TechCrunch...

item.title: The 29 Best Movies on Hulu This Week (June 2024)
item.description: Origin, Anchorman, and Fight Club are just a few of the movies you need to watch on Hulu right now.

item.title: Language learning app Speak nets $20M, doubles valuation
item.description: Speak, the AI-powered language learning app, has raised new money from investors at double its previous valuation. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reser...

item.title: Far-Right Militias Are Back
item.description: As the US election approaches, one armed militia organized by a January 6 rioter is spreading its message across the country.

item.title: SpaceX debuts portable Starlink Mini for $599
item.description: SpaceX unveiled Starlink Mini, a more portable version of its satellite internet product that is small enough to fit inside a backpack. Early Starlink...

item.title: We’re Still Waiting for the Next Big Leap in AI
item.description: Anthropic’s latest Claude AI model pulls ahead of rivals from OpenAI and Google. But advances in machine intelligence have lately been more incrementa...

item.title: Brex’s compliance head has left the fintech startup to join Andreessen Horowitz as a partner
